item.description:
November Lean Workshop


6:30pm - Mike Arsenault, Product Manager at Grasshopper Group


Spreadable is a powerful word of mouth tool which provides a mechanism for people having a positive experience on your website to yell from the rooftops about you. Spreadable not only encourages word of mouth and builds brand loyalty, but it makes you tons of money too.

Mike Arsenault is the Product Manager for Grasshopper Group. He loves building things, and has spent the last two years turning new product ideas into highly usable web applications designed to empower entrepreneurs to succeed. He works at the intersection of design, UX, marketing, and development to build products that solve real business problems.



7:20pm - Caomhan Connolly, Co-Founder of Buz (GetBuz.com)


Buz is a new product in development that helps businesses to increase customer acquisition and social media marketing by tapping into the social networks of existing customers.

Caomhan is an entrepreneur from Dublin, Ireland who is currently participating in the Chinaccelerator Programme in Dalian, China working on Buz.



6pm - Early Bird Presentation: Customer Development 101, with John Prendergast
[/url]
For those new to the concepts of Customer Development and The Lean Startup, please come early. From 6:00 to 6:30pm, John Prendergast, Organizer of the LSC Boston Meetup and CEO of BlueLeaf.com will talk about the basics of customer development and lean startups.
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk and come up to the 1st Floor
item.name: Lean Startup Circle Boston Monthly Meetup
